name: To the Center
description:
Fend off the oncoming waves of raiders in this action-puzzle game. Strategize which terminals to give your limited power and resources in order to defeat the endless attack. Instructions:

Select the red panels at the bottom of the screen to spawn a connector pipe.  These pipes transfer energy that can be used to connect power from your battery (center green tile) to your terminals. You can delete unwanted panels in the incenerator in the bottom right corner.

Controls:

Select/Move panels: Left Click

Rotate Panels: Right Click

Terminals:

There are 3 types of terminals:

  • Turret (Orange - 2 energy): An all-around average offensive terminal that can put out a decent amount of damage with low energy usage.
  • Cannon (Red - 3 energy): A strong, but slow offensive terminal.
  • Healer (Green - 3 energy): A terminal that is capable of extinguishing flames and healing your ship.
